column5: If I am putting my group's info into ArriveCan, do I need photos of their passports along with the vaccine card? I know we need to present actual passport at border, but I'm wondering if I need to have it in the app too? Thanks
You just have to put in the passport(s) number.
You have to have the passport info in ArriveCAN, you can either scan a picture or enter it manually. Don't necessarily need a picture of it.
Yes you do. It will not work without it.
